title: Franchise value of the New York Knicks ( NBA ) 2003 to 2020
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2004 to 2006, and lastly roughly constant from 2006 to 2010.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2004 and 2005.
The highest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 613.0 was reached at Year 2009
The lowest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 401.0 was reported at Year 2004
